item.description: CLI Usage # argo list # List workflows argo submit [--watch] myworkflow.yaml # Create workflow argo submit myworkflow.yaml -p foo=bar # Create workflow with parameters argo submit myworkflow.yaml --parameter-file config.yaml argo submit myworkflow.yaml --entry-point "my-command" argo logs <pod> # Show workflow log argo delete <pod> # Delete workflow argo delete --all # Delete all workflows You can also use kubectl kubectl get wf # List workflows kubectl delete wf <name> # Delete workflow Simple Workflow # apiVersion: argoproj.
